tool_description: TikTok Api.  HD videos without watermark and user, post, music, search, feeds, comments, followers, and trends.
name: Tiktok Video Feature Summary
title: Tiktok Video Feature Summary

api_list.name: get tiktok video full info
api_list.description:
Support Tiktok.
Returns relevant information about querying video addresses, 
including high-definition watermark free video addresses, 
author information, 
background music information, 
views, 
likes, 
comments, 
etc- List Item

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Tiktok or Douyin video address

https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSdGG1Y1k/
or
https://www.tiktok.com/@tiktok/video/7106658991907802411
or
7106658991907802411

optional_parameters.name: hd
optional_parameters.description: Get HD Video(High bit rate). This increases the total request time a little.

api_list.name: get feed video list by region
api_list.description: get feed video list by region

api_list.name: /ping
api_list.description: ping status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-video-feature-summary.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-video-feature-summary.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

optional_parameters.name: publish_time
optional_parameters.description:
0 - ALL
1 - Past 24 hours
7 - This week
30 - This month
90 - Last 3 months
180 - Last 6 months

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-video-feature-summary.p.rapidapi.com/region"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-video-feature-summary.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
